Reviews.Title: “Service and friendliness”
Reviews.Author: Orjan S Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: We highly recommend this nice hotel. The room was perfect. The staff/owners are fantastic. Stay here if it is available. Örjan och Eva Sjölin Hjo Sweden

Reviews.Title: “Uncomfortable with cold”
Reviews.Author: yahoo_traveller
Reviews.Content: Staff is friendly but the room facilities is poor. Cold with temperature less than 10 celcius at night!! Small shower place. The basic facilities sockets only have two [one is in the bathroom & one is sharing with the small (14') tv near the ceiling]..

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, friendly staff, very reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: sthart
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much for the nice, comfortable stay in your hotel. The staff was reliable and friendly and available and willing to help at all times. They gave me very good information about the city and also had a helpfull tourist map that they gave to me. The price level is very good, definitely competitive, with a good sized breakfast included. Compared to the price level in Rome, I actually found it quite reasonable. The central location in Rome makes it a very good starting point to wherever you want to go. There is a supermarket only about 100 meters from the hotel. The hotel is also located away from any high-traffic streets, making it a relaxed, peaceful place to stay. The hotel offered everything I needed for an enjoyable city trip to Rome and I would certainly recommend it to anyone else. Best regards, Stephen

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Giugiu
HotelInfo.Address: 8 Via del Viminale, 00184 Rome, Italy
